title: ISic000976. I.Sicily inscription 000976
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΟΥΛΠΙΑ[..]
2ΗΑΞΙΑΜ[..]
3ΕΖΗΣΕΝΕ[..---]
4ΜΗΝΕΣΙ´[...]
5ΡΕΣΙ´[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text of Ferrua 1941

English translation

Oulpiane, my beloved, lived (-) years, 10 months, 10 days ...

commentary
